name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForCongenitalHeartDisease
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Congenital Heart Disease
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to congenital heart disease and is listed as a cardiovascular disease on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes congenital heart disease. This includes congenital malformations of cardiac valves, septa, chambers, arteries and veins as well other congenital malformations (e.g., Dextrocardia).),(Exclusion Criteria: )
